reviewText: A very good documentary on the history of crime drama cinema. From the early days of film to modern day; the genre has stood the test of time.
Learn why we as law-abiding citizens are infatuated with gangsters. It will allow you to identify a side of yourself you may not have been familiar with.

I as a Mob Collector have seen all the Mafia movies and rank this one 5 stars because it truly shows how Mafia life has changed through the years. I however understand the life these fellas live and agree that if your a wise guy you know you will always have three things Respect,Loyalty,and Honor to be a made man is to be up in rank and will get anything you want no matter if it is money,women, and most of all power. I hope everyone enjoys this film for it is truly one of a kind.
